DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Study SPARC1210 Reference1210 Subjects With Metastatic Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: The subject give write , informed consent available entire study . Histologically cytologically confirm diagnosis breast cancer ; Locally recurrent metastatic breast cancer taxanebased therapy rational treatment option ; Age 18 year Known hypersensitivity study drug excipients ( Cholesteryl sulfate , Caprylic acid , Polyvinylpyrrolidone , Ethanol Polyethylene glycol ) ; Presence clinically evident active CNS metastasis , include leptomeningial involvement , require steroid radiation therapy ; Preexisting clinically significant peripheral neuropathy ( Grade 2 high accord CTCAE , Version 4.0 ) ; Any severe concurrent disease judgment investigator would make subject inappropriate entry study
